ing: 1 teaspoon sriracha sauce, or to taste
des: "My husband grew up in West Africa where peanut butter stew was popular, so he started wondering if peanut butter would go with eggs. The result was this recipe. It was a hit!"
ins:
Whisk eggs, peanut butter, ginger, garlic, seasoning sauce, and sriracha sauce together in a small bowl.
Heat a nonstick skillet over medium heat. Pour in egg mixture; cook and stir until scrambled and firm, about 5 minutes.
